bug.author: ranjitkathiriya
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>(module 'mxnet.gluon.data.vision.datasets' has no attribute 'ImageListDataset'</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
a = mx.gluon.data.vision.datasets.ImageListDataset(root=train_paths, imglist=None, flag=1) <denchmark-h:h2>What have you tried to solve it?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/issues/18702>#18702</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
It's unclear under what setting this happened since the bug report template wasn't properly filled, so there isn't much I could do. I confirm that the dataset class is still available here
incubator-mxnet/python/mxnet/gluon/data/vision/datasets.py
Line 365 in 6901325
class ImageListDataset(dataset.Dataset):
